title: Human pulse rate based on age / Kadar denyutan nadi manusia berdasarkan umur
question: Manipulated Variable / Pemboleh ubah dimanipulasikan 是
E: Type of physical activity / Jenis aktiviti fizikal

question: Responding Variable / Pemboleh ubah bergerak balas 是
E: Type of physical activity / Jenis aktiviti fizikal

question: Constant Variable / Pemboleh ubah dimalarkan 是
E: Type of physical activity / Jenis aktiviti fizikal

question: Factor that changed / Faktor yang diubah
E: Type of physical activity / Jenis aktiviti fizikal

question: Factor that observed / Faktor yang diperhatikan
E: Type of physical activity / Jenis aktiviti fizikal

question: Factor that fixed / Faktor yang ditetapkan
E: Type of physical activity / Jenis aktiviti fizikal

question: Ways to control Manipulated Variable / Cara mengawal Pemboleh ubah dimanipulasikan 是
A: Make sure the age of student is different / Pastikan umur murid adalah berbeza
B: Measure the pulse rate by using stopwatch / Mengukur kadar denyutan nadi dengan menggunakan jam randik
C: Make sure the gender of student is same / Pastikan jantina murid adalah sama
D: Make sure the type of physical activity is same / Pastikan jenis aktiviti fizikal adalah sama

question: Ways to control Responding Variable / Cara mengawal Pemboleh ubah bergerak balas 是
A: Make sure the age of student is different / Pastikan umur murid adalah berbeza
B: Measure the pulse rate by using stopwatch / Mengukur kadar denyutan nadi dengan menggunakan jam randik
C: Make sure the gender of student is same / Pastikan jantina murid adalah sama
D: Make sure the type of physical activity is same / Pastikan jenis aktiviti fizikal adalah sama

question: Ways to control Constant Variable / Cara mengawal Pemboleh ubah dimalarkan 是
A: Make sure the age of student is different / Pastikan umur murid adalah berbeza
B: Measure the pulse rate by using stopwatch / Mengukur kadar denyutan nadi dengan menggunakan jam randik
C: Make sure the gender of student is same / Pastikan jantina murid adalah sama
D: Make sure the type of physical activity is same / Pastikan jenis aktiviti fizikal adalah sama

question: Aim / Tujuan 怎么写?
A: To study the effect of age on the human pulse rate / Untuk mengkaji kesan umur terhadap kadar denyutan nadi
B: Does the age affect the pulse rate? / Adakah umur mempengaruhi kadar denyutan nadi?
C: The older the person, the lower the pulse rate / Semakin tua seorang, semakin rendah kadar denyutan nadi
D: Old people has lower pulse rate than young people / Orang tua mempunyai kadar nadi yang lebih rendah berbanding orang muda
